name: ALK Technologies
overview: ALK Technologies, Inc. develops mobile navigation and transportation technology solutions for customers in North America and internationally. The company provides consulting, information systems, and packaged software solutions. It also offers container tracking and management systems for ocean carriers and barge companies. In addition, the company provides CoPilot in-vehicle navigation and route guidance solutions; PC MILER routing, mileage, and mapping software for the transportation industry; and CoPilot Live iPhone GPS navigation application, which includes street maps of the United States and Canada, access to real-time information services, and a map update service. Its customers include motor carriers, shippers, railroads, logistics companies, businesses, and manufacturing companies. ALK Technologies, Inc. was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Princeton, New Jersey with additional offices in Englewood, Florida; Taipei, Taiwan; Aabenraa, Denmark; London, the United Kingdom; Paris, France; Munich, Germany; and Spain.
